greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Sum_{i>=1} x^(i^2)/(1 + x^(i^2)) * Product_{j>=1} (1 + x^(j^2)).
comment: Total number of parts in all partitions of n into distinct squares.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for related partition-counting sequences
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Sum[x^i^2/(1 + x^i^2), {i, 1, nmax}] Product[1 + x^j^2, {j, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jan 23 2017
